hints.content:
Let's show the $48$ meters in groups of $9$.

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: An array of 48 circles arranged in 5 rows of 9 circles each shaded green and 1 row of 3 circles shaded pink. !

hints.content:
There are $\maroonD3$ dots remaining without a group. These dots are the **remainder**.


Each dot represents $\maroonD{1}$ meter that is left for the worm to travel to reach her friend.
The remainder represents the number of meters the worm will travel on the last day.

question.content:
A worm plans to visit her friend the beetle. Her friend lives $48$ meters away. The worm plans to travel $9$ meters per day.  The worm divides to see how many days it will take to reach her friend.

$48\div9=5\text{ remainder }3$  

**Which of the following describes the remainder in this case?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: The number of extra days it will take the worm to reach the beetle
The number of meters the worm will travel on the last day
